comments:
I am using the Commit class in Eclipse 3.2M4 to commit files that do not correspond to eclipse IResources. When I go to commit them I get an NPE because clearModifiedState() calls cvsFile.getIResource().getFullPath().toString() just to put the path in the IStatus:

java.lang.NullPointerException

at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFolder.run(RemoteFolder.java:456)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Command.execute(Command.java:335)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Command.execute(Command.java:785)
